title: Nga Milestone & Nga Whakahua - Te Taputapu Orbital
heading: Nga Milestones me nga Whakapuakanga
description: Ko tenei mahi toi-tau maha he waahanga o te 13th Mercosul Bienal i Porto Alegre, Brazil, na Marcelo Dantas i whakahaere. Kua roa te rarangi ingoa mo te Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Kua toa hoki i te ArtSat Category o te whakataetae CubeDesign 2021, i whakatairangahia e te Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
